ComicInfo.Summary:
Will Sir Woodworth and his cohorts enjoy inconceivable riches or face complete devastation? Don't miss the exciting final chapter and epilogue of "In Search of Peter Pan"! Impatient for transformation, Shamah gets far more than he expects in chapter four of "Rork: Starlight," and Phil Elliott strikes a note of cautious paranoia in "Conspiracy Theory." *Story Titles * Conspiracy Theory In Search of Peter Pan Chapter 9 Rork: Starlight Chapter 4
